Author: jl777c#5810
Content: pushed fix

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: it was a problem for all OS!

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: turn_see is a normal function that was used as a daemon, and it was passed 2 args instead of 1, which changed the value it was using, depending on whatever was top of stack. very very bad and leads to memory problems or random crash, or just non-deterministic behavior

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: and the longer the game the more likely this happened

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: so the long game lost players might be fixed now

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: unless there is an even rarer edge case

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: definitely rebuild this is memory corruption level bug
